name: Fantasy Feud
description: Social gaming for daily fantasy sports
overview:
Fantasy Sports 2.0–Social gaming platform for Fantasy Sports.

Fantasy Feud Inc. has created a competitive environment and community for fantasy sports enthusiasts to show-off their skills and profit. The social gaming platform has created a marketplace for daily and weekly leagues that feed users the instant gratification they lacked in traditional season long leagues.

Inspired by the model of online poker-The Fantasy Feud platform handles all the buy-ins, payouts, and matchmaking of users. It also provides injury news and all the stats needed to build a winning lineup. Users customize the game formats they wish to join and can compete in FREE LEAGUES or those that have monetary prizes.

Fantasy Feud’s community and chat connects like minded fantasy sports enthusiasts and provides them an online home whereby they can interact, discuss strategy, stat-track with live scoring and challenge each other.
